subject: Rugby
lead_paragraph: New Zealand surged into the Rugby World Cup final for a record fourth time when it proved too strong, too dangerous and ultimately too canny for South Africa in a tense 20-18 victory in London.
snippet: New Zealand surged into the Rugby World Cup final for a record fourth time when it proved too strong, too dangerous and ultimately too canny for South Africa in a tense 20-18 victory in London.
